name: SpaceCrafter
description:
Description:

Help a team of astronauts escape their hazardous space station and get back home. Starting with nothing, gather whatever resources you can find to build a path to the shuttle, avoiding both lasers and falling into the deep void of space.

Gameplay:

  • Tiles you pick up can connect to fixed tiles and each other.
  • Groups of tiles will fall if one of them is not anchored to a fixed tile.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Select/Place Tiles: LMB
  • Remove Tiles: RMB
  • Back to Main Menu: ESC (all progress will reset)

Objects:

Team:

  • Lead Programmer: Nelson L
  • Graphic/Level Design: Michael P
  • Original Music: Jesse P
